translation.en: [woman] I can't come over, Todd. I'm babysitting.
translation.ko: 애 보는 중이라 못 가, 토드

translation.en: Yeah, I finally got her to fall asleep. Took forever, though.
translation.ko: 응, 백만 년 걸려서 겨우 재웠어

translation.en: I mean, I've never seen a kid so scared of her own toys. [laughs]
translation.ko: 자기 장난감을 저렇게 무서워하는 애는 처음 봐

translation.en: [girl] It's not a nightmare, Monster Girl. Just your life.
translation.ko: 악몽이 아니야, 몬스터 걸 그게 네 삶이야

translation.en: [teacher] Miss Ferguson, I know you skipped a grade in math,
translation.ko: 퍼거슨 학생, 수학 월반한 거 알아

translation.en: That doesn't mean you can sleep through my class.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 내 수업에서 자도 되는 건 아니야

translation.en: Then calculate the volume of that object using the proper formula.
translation.ko: 그럼 적절한 공식을 사용해서 저 물체의 부피를 구해 봐

translation.en: -♪ It can't get better than this… ♪ -Thanks.
-I didn't say to take a wild guess. -That's not a wild guess.
but I decided to round up.
-♪ What would they say instead… ♪ -[echoing] Hey! Look who it is.
Am I always gonna be known as the Monster Girl?
translation.ko: 난 몬스터 걸에서 벗어날 수 없는 걸까?

translation.en: Well, I mean, you did tell people that a monster attacked you. So…
translation.ko: 네 입으로 괴물이 널 공격했다고 했잖아

translation.en: You ate crayons when we were kids. No one calls you Crayola Mouth.
translation.ko: 그때 넌 크레파스 먹었는데 '크레파스 보이' 아니잖아

translation.en: Let's face it, monsters aren't real.
translation.ko: 인정할 건 하자 세상에 괴물이 어딨냐?

translation.en: Oh, my God. Even my best friend thinks I'm crazy.
Yeah. You are crazy. That's why you're my best friend.
translation.ko: 그래, 너 미쳤어 그래서 내 절친인 거야

translation.en: -[crash] -[boy] Hey! Give me my wig back!
-There's no costumes allowed. -Hah! Yeah? It's Halloween!
translation.ko: 교칙이잖아, 제스퍼 학교에선 코스튬 금지야 그래요? 핼러윈이잖아요 헌법에 위배된다고요

translation.en: All right? Big time Halloween party at mine tonight!
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 우리 집에서 성대한 핼러윈 파티가 열린다

translation.en: Costumes are not only allowed, they're mandatory! -[cheering] -Okay?
We should totally go to that party.
I don't know. Jesper is a senior. We're only freshmen.
Kelly, it's Halloween. The one night we can be anything we want.
translation.ko: 켈리, 핼러윈이야 뭐든 될 수 있는 유일한 밤

translation.en: Anything in the world. What do you wanna be?
translation.ko: 뭐든 가능해, 넌 뭐가 되고 싶어?

translation.en: Oh, we are so going to that party.
Oh, just… makin' a Halloween costume.
Uh-- Halloween party at a friend's house.
And you were planning on going?
I may have suggested that you would…

translation.ko: 꼬맹이 하나 봐달라고 부탁할까 했는데 - 젤먼 씨 아들 - 엄마 상사?

translation.en: -The Ice Queen? -Uh, yes, but don't-- don't call her that.
translation.ko: 그 얼음 여왕? 응, 근데 그렇게 부르진 마

translation.en: Well, my company Halloween party is tonight,
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 회사 핼러윈 파티를 하는데

translation.en: and I overheard Ms. Zellman complaining that she couldn't find a sitter,
translation.ko: 얼핏 들으니까 애 봐줄 사람을 못 구했더라고

translation.en: so I thought-- Well, I thought you could…
translation.ko: 그래서 난 네가 될 줄 알고…

translation.en: So, you threw my name out there to babysit?
-Dad! Mom sold me out to her boss! -[sighs]
-[Dad] Listen to your mother, Kelly. -[Kelly scoffs]
-Thanks for havin' my back, Dad! -[Dad] No problem, sweetie.
translation.ko: - 내 편 들어 줘서 고마워 - 고맙긴

translation.en: You know, I can barely keep my phone charged,
let alone take care of some kid.
[sighs] Now, if I cancel on Ms. Zellman, she'll be furious.
translation.ko: 이제 와서 안 된다고 하면 젤먼 씨 난리 나

translation.en: [whispers] This is the Ice Queen we're talking about.

translation.ko: - 아주 잘 할 거야, 그리고! - 하지만…

translation.en: …you'll make 15 dollars an hour. You can totally do this, sweetie!
Thank you. Thank you! You're gonna be great!
I-- I-- I mean, your costume is-- it's literally--
I printed up a list of no-no's.
"No ice cream, no gluten, no caffeine, no dairy, no peanuts,
no more than 30 minutes of screen time"?
You have a stopwatch on your cell phone, right?
Jacob may have three pieces of candy.
-Oh! I've got some-- -No, no, no, no.
Raisins, dried apple chips, or puffed rice cakes.

translation.ko: 그리고 뛰거나 소리 지르면 안 되고

translation.en: no discussing global tragedies or current events.
translation.ko: 세계적인 재난이나 시사 얘기는 하지 마

translation.en: Poison control, his doctor, his dentist.
translation.ko: 독극물 통제 센터 주치의, 치과 의사

translation.en: It takes three hours just to put him to sleep?
If he goes to sleep at all.
-Halloween's scary. -It'll be okay, honey. I promise.
Your muzzie-wuzzie loves you so much.
translation.ko: 엄마가 우리 귀요미 아주 많이 사랑해요

translation.en: I'll be home at midnight. Follow the list.
translation.ko: 자정에 올 테니까 지침 잘 지켜

translation.en: Lock the doors. And no trick-or-treaters.
translation.ko: 문 잠그고 애들 사탕 주지 말고

translation.en: Don't put me to bed! I can't go to sleep.
translation.ko: 나 재우지 말아요 난 못 잔단 말이에요

translation.en: that comes out of my fish tank.
It feels like it's coming to get me, but Mom says it's just a nightmare.
translation.ko: 날 잡으러 오는 것 같은데 엄마는 그냥 악몽이래요

translation.en: I actually know a lot about nightmares.
But it's just your mind playing tricks on you.
translation.ko: 하지만 그건 네 마음이 장난치는 거야

translation.en: Mine can. I can make monsters.
translation.ko: 내 마음은 가능해요 난 괴물을 만들 수 있어요

translation.en: There's no such thing as monsters.
-What happened to Tedster? -I dreamt he was on fire.
translation.ko: 곰돌이 왜 이래? 걔가 불타는 꿈을 꿨어요

translation.en: And when I woke up, he was.
translation.ko: 그리고 일어나 보니 그렇게 돼 있었어요

translation.en: [Tedster, slowly] I want to hug you.
If it makes you feel any better,
when I was a little kid,
I thought my bad dreams could come true too.
Now I'm just scared of real-life stuff,
like climate change, and inequality, and talking to boys,
and, like, everything I read on Twitter. It's really scary.
translation.ko: 트위터에 뜨는 글들 이젠 그런 게 무서워

translation.en: How about… I check under your bed?
Okay, but don't turn off the lights!
You know what I do when I get scared of the dark?
translation.ko: 난 그럴 때 뭘 하는지 알아?

translation.en: These… are my own personal night-lights.
[Kelly] You can have this one. [Jacob] Thanks.
-[dance music playing] -[Kelly] All right, engage my FOMO.
I am the crown jewel of nutritious snacks.
You gotta get over here, Kelly.
Deanna is about to walk that plank.
-Go get 'em, Tommy. -[Tommy] All right. I-- I'd love to.
Look at what you've done here.
Your Gift of Dreams bringing nightmares to life.
translation.ko: 네겐 악몽을 현실로 만드는 꿈의 재능이 있어

translation.en: Enunciate, darling. Try using your words.
Just a tentacle? Not attached to anything.
Now that's an outside the box nightmare, even for me.
translation.ko: 나조차도 상상 못 한 아주 기발한 악몽이야

translation.en: You and I are about to unleash your nightmares on the world.
translation.ko: 너와 내가 곧 네 악몽을 세상에 풀어놓을 거야

translation.en: Hi. These-- these things just took the kid I was babysitting.
translation.ko: 제가 애를 보고 있었는데 그것들이 애를 데려갔어요

translation.en: Yes, I am aware it's Halloween night, but this… this is not a joke.
translation.ko: 네, 핼러윈인 거 아는데 농담 아니에요

translation.en: This is serious. These were proper creatures of the night, they-- they--
Liz Lerue. Babysitter. We got a nightmare ping come from here.
translation.ko: 리즈 레루, 베이비시터야 여기서 악몽 핑이 떴는데

translation.en: I'll be the judge of that. [sighs] Where's your charge?
translation.ko: 그건 내가 판단해 네 담당은 어딨어?

translation.en: The human being you're supposed to be responsible for?
These things came out from under the bed. They took him.
translation.ko: 그것들이 침대 밑에서 나와서 애를 데려갔어

translation.en: Look, I tried calling the police, but they thought it was a prank.
-Hey! You can't go in there! -What'd these things look like?
translation.ko: - 집에는 들어가면 안 돼 - 그것들 어떻게 생겼어?

translation.en: Um, they were small and fat, with crazy teeth and weird hair.
What were they wearing? Did they have eyes?
Um, they were two to three feet high. Uh, claws.
They had weird mouths and two eyes, lopsided.
translation.ko: 입이 이상했어 눈은 두 개인데 한쪽으로 처졌고

translation.en: What's a "Toadie"? Also, whose baby is that?
translation.ko: 토디가 뭐야? 그리고 걔는 누구 애야?

translation.en: Is it yours? I'm not judging if it is.
translation.ko: 네 애야? 난 그런 거로 편견 안 가져

translation.en: This is Carmella. -Carmella, say hi. Don't be shy. -[gurgles]
translation.ko: 얘는 카르멜라야 카르멜라, 부끄러워 말고 인사해

translation.en: I'm babysitting her because that's what actual babysitters do.
translation.ko: 난 얘를 돌보고 있어 그게 진짜 베이비시터의 의무니까

translation.en: We watch and protect our kids.
Now, stand over there and play the quiet game.
[Liz] You're like a calculator. What time are the parents home?
translation.ko: 인간 계산기네 부모님은 몇 시에 오셔?

translation.en: [Kelly] Midnight. His mom is very intense. She would never be late.
translation.ko: 자정에, 엄마가 칼 같은 분이라 - 절대 안 늦으실 거야 - 알았어, 넌 여기 있어
- 절대 안 늦으실 거야 - 알았어, 넌 여기 있어

translation.en: chew your hair, find out what you'd look like with dog ears, I don't care.
translation.ko: 머리카락을 씹든 강아지 귀 달고 셀카를 찍든 네 마음대로 해 단, 애 엄마한테 전화 오면

translation.en: But if the mom calls, you act like everything's cool.
translation.ko: 네 마음대로 해 단, 애 엄마한테 전화 오면 아무 일 없는 척해, 알았지?

translation.en: Excuse you! I'm coming with you.
No. You will just get in my way.
Or you'll get possessed, hypnotized, cursed, boiled,
translation.ko: 게다가 넌 뭐에 씌거나 저주에 걸리거나 끓는 물에 던져지거나

translation.en: or turned into a three-headed dog of darkness.
translation.ko: 머리 셋 달린 어둠의 개가 될 수도 있어

translation.en: Wait, did you even see this?
They come from out of Jacob's window, run down here, and then they just vanish.
translation.ko: 제이컵 창문으로 나와서 여기까지 오다 사라졌어

translation.en: They don't match the claws that those trollies had--
translation.ko: 발톱 모양이 아니야 - 그 트롤리들… - 토디

translation.en: And they have an entirely different pattern and diameter,
which means a completely different thing was here.
translation.ko: 완전히 다른 뭔가가 여기 있었다는 거지

translation.en: -♪ Get ready for the show-ow… ♪ -We've got Toadies on our hands.
Bring me up on the tracker.
Pull up a map of their main tunnels.
No! Not you, just some girl.
translation.ko: 아니, 너 말고, 어떤 여자애 있어

translation.en: GPR activity near Sharkie Park? Copy that.
translation.ko: 샤키 파크 근처에서 GPR 움직임 포착됐어? 오케이

translation.en: ♪ And it's gone runnin' ♪ ♪ Trouble's comin' ♪
Toadies have a network of tunnels under the city.
Sometimes our monster GPR picks up their movements.
translation.ko: 우리 몬스터 GPR에 움직임이 잡힐 때가 있어

translation.en: -[Kelly] We're not going in the tunnels. -[Liz] Nope.
Like, gross to the third power.
Anyway, look for a hidden tunnel. Should be around here somewhere.
translation.ko: 아무튼, 비밀 터널을 찾아봐 이 근처에 있을 거야

translation.en: -[Kelly] How do you know all this stuff? -[Liz] Check the bag.
translation.ko: 넌 이런 걸 어떻게 다 알아? 내 가방 열어봐

translation.en: [Liz] It's a collection of thousands of years' worth
of monster hunting wisdom passed down through the ages.
translation.ko: 대대로 전해져 온 몬스터 사냥 비법서야

translation.en: Uh, the Toadies dug their tunnel right at the end of the slide,
so when a kid comes shooting down…
-[Kelly] Why do you need baby powder? -[sighs]
"Beware. Toadies love the smell of newborns.
One of 'em pops out looking for a snack, boom, got 'em.
translation.ko: 한 놈이 간식 찾아 튀어나오면 확! 잡는 거지

translation.en: You're using the baby as bait? No!
Listen, this is the only thing that will get them up to the surface.
translation.ko: 놈들을 위로 끌어낼 방법은 이것밖에 없어
- 도저히 안 되겠어 - 켈리, 안 돼!

translation.en: By the Order of the Babysitters, I demand you return that child!
translation.ko: 베이비시터 결사단의 이름으로 그 아이를 돌려줄 것을 요구한다!

translation.en: Don't worry, Carmella. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.ko: 뭐야! 걱정 마, 카르멜라 내가 꼭 지켜줄게

translation.en: -[growls] -[Liz] Hey, hey! Hey, hey! Look what I've got.
If you give us the boy, you get sparkly.
translation.ko: 그 남자애 넘겨주면 이 반짝이 줄게

translation.en: [Liz] Come on, don't play hardball with me.
-[Liz] Jacob or sparkly? -[Kelly] Okay. Hello. Hi.
Oh! You mean-- No. Yeah. Um-- Everything's fine.
translation.ko: 아, 그 몬스터요 아무 문제 없어요

translation.en: Jacob and I are having so much fun.
translation.ko: 제이컵은 저랑 아주 재밌게 놀고 있어요

translation.en: -[Toadie gurgling] -What's that noise? Uh… It's… it's a movie.
That sounds like a scary movie. Check the list, Kelly. No scary movies.
translation.ko: 무서운 영화 같은데 지침을 봐, 켈리 - 공포 영화는 안 돼 - 아뇨, 웃긴 영화예요

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! It's-- it's a fun movie.
translation.ko: - 공포 영화는 안 돼 - 아뇨, 웃긴 영화예요

translation.en: -It's about unicorns and rainbows and… -[Toadie chattering and growling]
-A… unicorn fell off a… a rainbow. -[Toadie squealing]
[Kelly] But it was saved by a cloud. We're all good here.
translation.ko: 근데 구름 위로 떨어졌죠 여기는 아무 문제 없어요

translation.en: Let me speak to Jacob. Now!
You said you were watching a movie.
No, he just-- he just fell asleep like that.
Tonight is a night of firsts.
[woman] The tenth annual company costume party is about to begin!
translation.ko: 제10회 사내 코스튬 파티가 곧 시작합니다!

translation.en: [Ms. Zellman] I'm glad Jacob fell asleep early.
[Kelly] I'm gonna be grounded for all of eternity.
So, how are we gonna get him back now?
That's why this little creep's comin' with us.
-[Carmella coos] -It's nine o'clock, Carmella. -We'll get you home, sweetie. -[cooing]
The Toadies always trade. This is worse than I thought.
The guest of honor has arrived, finally!
I trust your travels were smooth.
-I wanna go home! -You're not going anywhere.
translation.ko: - 집에 갈래요 - 넌 아무 데도 못 가

translation.en: I suppose you want to know how it all works.
I've slowly, but surely, accumulated 51 rare gases
translation.ko: 난 오랫동안 신중하게 51개의 희귀 가스를 모았어

translation.en: and mixed them with the perfect specificity.
To fill these beautiful tanks with enough power
to manifest my army of nightmares into actual life!
Aah! Terrors alive like never seen before.
translation.ko: 한 번도 보지 못한 공포가 현실이 될 거야

translation.en: All I needed was just one more little tiny ingredient,
translation.ko: 이제 딱 한 가지 재료만 남았어

translation.en: a pathetic yet highly imaginative little twerp,
personified in this case by… well…
will conjure an army of infinite nightmares.
You and I are about to ruin the world.
[Kelly] Wow. We got the baby back to her parents just in time.
I hope she wasn't too freaked out.
[Liz] Freaked out? Carmella loves monster hunting.
How much did her parents pay for you to look after Carmella?
Is that the going rate these days for using a baby as bait?
translation.ko: 요새는 아기를 미끼로 쓰고 그 정도 받아?

translation.en: Ninety-nine percent of the time, that should've worked.
What are you making? Fifteen dollars an hour?
I trust you're snug as a bug?
Have you ever been hypnotized? It's grand.
translation.ko: 최면에 걸린 적 있어? 진짜 끝내주는데

translation.en: -[whimpering] No! Aah! -Stop wriggling, you little worm.
My evil lullaby will put you into a deep, dark sleep.
translation.ko: 내 사악한 자장가로 깊고 어두운 잠에 빠지게 할 거야

translation.en: -[choir joins in] -♪What a gift, what a sight to behold ♪
translation.ko: 얼마나 멋진 선물인가? 얼마나 멋진 광경인가?

translation.en: ♪ Child, you'll do as you're told ♪
Aah! Your Gift of Dreams is blocking my lullaby.
translation.ko: 네 꿈의 재능이 내 자장가를 차단하는구나

translation.en: I have a few tricks up my sleeve.
Okay, well… when my mom wants me to go to sleep…

translation.ko: - 초강력 에너지 음료를 줬어요 - 그래 초콜릿 입힌 원두 과자도요

translation.en: Then I'm out like a light.
Do you think I was born yesterday?
♪ Bom, bom-bom Bom-bom-bom-bom-bom-bom-bom… ♪ -[girl laughing] -[boy] Yeah, I know. [girl] Let me on your back!
-We're throwing the Toadie in the trash? -[growling]
Yeah. That's exactly what we're doing.
♪ I want you to be mon amour ♪
Welcome to the Rhode Island chapter of the Order of the Babysitters.
translation.ko: 베이비시터 결사단 로드아일랜드 지부에 온 걸 환영해

translation.en: We're part of a super secret organization with chapters all around the world.
translation.ko: 우린 철저한 비밀 단체로 전 세계에 지부가 있지

translation.en: Cleopatra, Merlin, Rosa Parks, all babysitters.
translation.ko: "잔 다르크" 클레오파트라, 멀린, 로자 파크스 다 베이비시터였어

translation.en: [Liz] Yeah. We've been around for thousands of years.
and I'll feed you to our resident hobgoblin.
translation.ko: 널 우리 지부 도깨비 밥으로 던져줄 거야

translation.en: Listen up, SITs. Our mission is Jacob Zellman.
translation.ko: 잘 들어, 훈련생들 구출 대상은 제이컵 젤먼이야

translation.en: Five years old, possibly with the Gift of Dreams.
translation.ko: 다섯 살이고 꿈의 재능을 지녔을 수 있어

translation.en: We have three hours and five minutes until his mom gets back
and finds her little bundle of joy missing.
translation.ko: 자기 보물단지가 없어진 걸 알게 될 거야

translation.en: Nothing new from the surveillance cameras.
Hey, Berna, will you start the laser scan?
[girl] All right. Let's take a look in this Toadie's pouch.
translation.ko: 자, 토디 주머니에 뭐가 들었나 볼까?

translation.en: What the heck? Is that half a duck?
-How big are their pouches? -Who's the human?
translation.ko: - 주머니가 얼마나 큰 거야? - 이 민간인은 누구야?

translation.en: [girl] And why exactly is she here?
She was with the kid when he got taken.
Just search the thing for clues.
It's a Monstria Chordata Amphibia Carnivora of the Toadie subspecies.
translation.ko: 토디 변종인 몬스터계 척삭동물문 육식 양서류라고

translation.en: -[sighs] Remove her. -Cassie, this isn't your call.
translation.ko: - 쟤 내보내 - 캐시, 넌 그럴 권한 없어

translation.en: You're just a Sitter in Training.
I mean, see this? And this?
It's gonna take me hours to remove the items from its pouch.
translation.ko: 주머니 물건 다 꺼내려면 몇 시간은 걸릴 거야

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. So sorry. -[Liz] Follow me.
Hey. So, this Jacob kid really has the Gift of Dreams?
translation.ko: 얘, 그 제이컵이란 애한테 진짜 꿈의 재능이 있어?

translation.en: I just told her what Jacob told me.
translation.ko: 제이컵한테 들은 걸 리즈한테 말했을 뿐이야

translation.en: I don't even really know what the Gift of Dreams is.
A young kid who is supposed to be able to bring dreams to life.
translation.ko: 그 능력이 있는 애는 꿈을 현실로 불러낼 수 있어

translation.en: The Order was founded to protect kids like that.
translation.ko: 이 결사단은 그런 아이들을 지키려고 만들어진 거야

translation.en: I could tell you a bit more over a cup of coffee, maybe?
Can you make one of your memory potions?
Uh… Yeah. I, uh… I have a passion for potions.
translation.ko: 알았어 난 약 만드는 걸 좋아하거든

translation.en: -[Kelly] What is that? -It's Minotaur Memory Dust.
Three parts beetle root, one part gnome guano.
translation.ko: 딱정벌레 뿌리와 요정 배설물을 3 대 1로 섞은 거지

translation.en: Yet, I have not tested this batch out yet, so I hope I don't fry her brain.
translation.ko: 그건 아직 시험 못 했는데 뇌가 망가지진 않겠지?

translation.en: Now, tell us every single detail you remember when Jacob was taken.
translation.ko: 제이컵이 납치될 때 상황을 하나도 빠짐없이 말해봐

translation.en: Maybe I used too much beetle root?
I heard that song when I was a little girl…
I've been looking for a girl who can make her dreams come to life,
translation.ko: 난 꿈을 현실로 만들 수 있는 소녀를 찾아다녔지

translation.en: ♪ Now give into the darkness inside ♪
-[Kelly sings along] -♪ In the clutches of sleep ♪
[man and choir] ♪You'll do as you're told ♪
translation.ko: 넌 내가 시키는 대로 할 거야

translation.en: [Cassie] Why did it stop on the Grand Guignol?
[boy] He's the Stealer of Dreams, the Bringer of Nightmares.
translation.ko: 꿈을 훔치는 자 악몽을 부르는 자야

translation.en: Legend has it he's collecting bad dreams from kids
That's him. [Liz] What do you mean?
That's the monster who tried to take me when I was a little girl!
Liz, those prints I found. They were tail marks, just like this.
translation.ko: 아까 내가 발견한 자국도 이런 꼬리 모양이었어

translation.en: I think he's what took Jacob.
This can't be happening. Not again.
translation.ko: 어떻게 또 이래? 말도 안 돼
괜찮아? - 그게 말이지 - 우리가 할 얘기는 아니야

translation.en: [Berna] It's not our story to tell, Curtis.
translation.ko: - 그게 말이지 - 우리가 할 얘기는 아니야

translation.en: "The Grand Guignol travels in the Nightmare Realm.
The Boogeypeople are almost impossible to locate when they are in there."
translation.ko: '부기족이 그 안에 있을 땐 위치 추적이 거의 불가능하다'

translation.en: My whole life, my whole life I was told this wasn't real.
That it didn't happen. But now…
translation.ko: 그건 현실이 아니었다고 근데 이제 와서…

translation.en: -But now… -This is why we don't let normies in here.
translation.ko: 이래서 민간인은 데려오면 안 된다는 거야

translation.en: Each of us has been through a monster attack.
This is from a Class Two Oozer.
[Curtis] Yeah, I've got one of those, too.
-[Curtis] I was impaled by a Brush troll. -[Berna] This is from a vampire rabbit.
translation.ko: - 브러시 트롤한테 찔린 적도 있어 - 이건 뱀파이어 토끼
- 바바야가 - 버니큘라 - 이건 종이에 베였어 - 히드라

translation.en: -[Curtis] I got this from a Cloud Serpent. -No one wants to see that, Curtis.
translation.ko: - 이건 구름 구렁이가… - 안 보여줘도 돼

translation.en: To make sure what happened to us never happens to another kid.
translation.ko: 우리가 당한 일을 다른 애들이 겪지 않게 하려고

translation.en: So how do we take down the Grand Guignol?
We don't. Well, there is a way.
Yet the ingredients are crazy combustible.
translation.ko: 근데 재료가 엄청나게 잘 타는 것들이야

translation.en: We're talking, uh, uh… cobalt from Athena's tomb,
-I have my sources. -[Kelly] And the Monster Punch?
translation.ko: "전설의 몬스터 펀치" - 다 공급책이 있어 - 몬스터 펀치는?

translation.en: That's the only way to drive the Angel Fire
It's crazy hard to execute, even if you could get near him.
translation.ko: 부기맨이 앞에 있어도 이걸 해내기란 하늘의 별 따기지

translation.en: There's a solution to every problem.
[Liz] All right. Let's put that to the test.
Yes! Time to geek out. Follow me!
[Curtis] No, it's not actually a jump rope.
It's a net made from powerful Stiltskin Thread.
This is the Mist of Hypnos.
One spray can knock a lesser monster out cold.
translation.ko: 약한 몬스터는 한 번만 뿌려도 기절해

translation.en: [Cassie] Stop trying to impress her. I am not!
translation.ko: - 멋있는 척 그만해 - 그런 거 아니야

translation.en: And this… is the Booyah Bear.
Yank the ear and throw. Go ahead.
-[Liz] Don't waste the weapons, Curtis. -[Curtis sighs]
The Cairo chapter found this in a tomb in Egypt.
We haven't figured out all it can do, but we know it can break any hex or spell.
translation.ko: 우리도 이 물건의 힘을 다 파악하진 못했지만 모든 저주와 주문을 풀 수 있는 건 확실해

translation.en: Here, take it. It might come in handy.
If you're insisting on coming, you can feed the Toadie.
translation.ko: 굳이 같이 가겠다면 토디 밥부터 줘

translation.en: -Wait, wait, wait. I don't know how to-- -[Liz] Open it.
Did you put a tracker in the trash?
Sure did. And now he'll scramble back to the Grand Guignol.
translation.ko: - 쓰레기에 추적기를 넣어놨어? - 당연하지 이제 그랑기뇰한테 쪼르르 달려갈 거야

translation.en: Finally, we can locate a Boogeyman.
You wanted it to jump out at me. You knew it would escape?
translation.ko: 나한테 달려들게 했잖아 도망칠 줄 알았지?

translation.en: We are trying to rescue Jacob, Kelly.
[Grand Guignol] Gnome Street? What are you doing there?
No, don't bring them here, you smell-feast.
translation.ko: 여기로 끌고 오면 안 되지 스컹크 자식아

translation.en: I have a dear friend right around the corner from you.
translation.ko: 그 근처에 나의 소중한 친구가 있어

translation.en: Lead them there and inform him…
ah, the babysitter buffet is officially open.
The tracker says the Toadie's close by. Take the right fork.
translation.ko: 토디가 이 근처에 있어 오른쪽으로 가

translation.en: [Kelly] It's the next driveway on your right.
-♪ Oh, watchin' her move… ♪ -Come on, baby! Yes!
-Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no. -What?
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 여긴 안 돼 - 왜?

translation.en: -This is Jesper Huang's party. -Bunch of sweaty teenagers?
translation.ko: 제스퍼 황의 파티야 땀범벅인 십 대들?

translation.en: Place must smell like a smorgasbord to a monster.
translation.ko: 몬스터들은 냄새 맡고 뷔페 열린 줄 알걸?

translation.en: Come on. Toadie's in there somewhere. Let's go.
My crush is right there, and I'm covered in dirt,
translation.ko: 저기 내 짝사랑남이 있는데 나 지금 거지꼴에

translation.en: and smell like trash, and I wore the exact same sweater to school today.
translation.ko: 쓰레기 냄새나고 학교에서 입은 옷 그대로야

translation.en: Victor Colleti is not "just a dude."
And Deanna's here. Great! She looks amazing, of course.
translation.ko: 그리고 디애나도 있어 그럼 그렇지, 오늘도 멋지네
"말도 없이 가서 미안 진짜 끝내주는 애랑 나왔어!"

translation.en: Liz, I can't go in there. I'm having major anxiety.
translation.ko: 리즈, 난 못 들어가 불안해서 미쳐버릴 것 같아

translation.en: I mean, you're more scared of a mean girl and some dude than a monster?
Well, that girl you pointed to looks far from amazing.
translation.ko: 그리고 저 여자애 하나도 안 멋진데?

translation.en: I mean, she's wearing a cat costume.
every basic girl who has thought that she's hot
translation.ko: 자기가 예쁜 줄 아는 흔해 빠진 여자애들은

translation.en: -has worn a cat costume. -♪ I was lost in the rhythm… ♪
[sighs] And the guy, sure, he's eye candy. I get it.
translation.ko: 그래, 저 남자애는 봐줄 만은 하네

translation.en: But that is not what is important right now.
translation.ko: 하지만 지금은 그게 중요한 게 아니야

translation.en: You're obviously smart. Act like it.
[Jesper] Oh, no way! -Monster Girl's here! -[girl] Hey!
[Jesper] Everyone, Monster Girl's here! -[girl] Monster Girl! -[Jesper] Now it's a Halloween party!
translation.ko: 얘들아, 몬스터 걸이 왔어 이제 진짜 핼러윈 파티답네

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. It's-- it's the worst.
Is that your-- is that-- is that your costume?
Yeah, I-- I went as myself. Went meta.
[Kelly] That was him. He talked to me!
Don't be that girl. Come on, focus. Toadie's down here somewhere.
translation.ko: 뻔하게 굴지 말고 집중해 토디가 여기 어디 있어

translation.en: -Liz, I'm not cool. -Just take the net. Sh!
translation.ko: - 리즈, 나 안 침착해 - 그물이나 꺼내

translation.en: -Are we going on three, or after three? -Three!
translation.ko: - 셋에 열어? 셋 한 다음? - 셋!
함정이야, 그림자 괴물인데 어둠 속에서 살아

translation.en: It lives in the dark. We'll be fine as long as the light stays on.
translation.ko: 함정이야, 그림자 괴물인데 어둠 속에서 살아 불만 켜져 있으면 괜찮아
걱정 마 제스퍼 황은 늘 준비돼 있지

translation.en: I'll get the Toadie. You handle that.
translation.ko: 난 토디를 잡을 테니까 넌 저걸 맡아

translation.en: Check the guide. Strengths, weaknesses, how to defeat them, it's all in there.
translation.ko: - 뭐? 내가? - 가이드를 봐 강점, 약점 무찌르는 법이 다 있어

translation.en: Ah. Shadow Monster. Hates bright light.
Hey, is everything okay down here?
-[screeches] -Uh, yeah, everything's-- Everything's fine down here. Yeah.
Don't come down here. Um, is there punch?
Let's get some punch. I'm thirsty. -Are you thirsty? -Am I?
translation.ko: 펀치 마시러 가자 목마르네, 너도 목말라?

translation.en: You brought your homework to the party?
Catching up with, uh… with-- with bio.
You know, catching up, and extra credit. Not that extra credit makes you a nerd--
translation.ko: 추가 점수 받는 과제인데 이런 거 한다고 범생이는 아니야

translation.en: Not that you're a nerd if you do extra--
Oh. You're here, too. How anti-fabulous.
-You know this is a costume party, right? -She came as herself. Very meta.
translation.ko: - 코스튬 파티인 거 알지? - 자기 자신으로 분장한 거야

translation.en: 'Cause you're gonna love it when you're dancing with me.
translation.ko: 나랑 추면 안 좋을 수가 없거든

translation.en: -Kelly, where are you going? -Finally. I thought she'd never leave.
translation.ko: - 켈리, 어디 가? - 드디어 갔네, 눈치 없긴

translation.en: Victor. Oh, my gosh, you scared me.
-[chuckles] Sorry, I-- Sorry-- -Oh, I-- Sorry. Sorry. Um… Okay.
Um, I was gonna ask you, when we were at the-- at the table…
translation.ko: 밑에 있을 때 - 물어보려고 했는데 - 응

translation.en: -Why aren't you wearing your costume? -Oh! Um…
-Okay… -And I will meet you in one second.
-Oh, come on! -[Victor] Hey, do you want me to come out?
Hey, everyone! Take a picture of this!
Oh! Do not try that at home, kids.
Hey, make fun of her one more time.
translation.ko: 야, 얘 한 번만 더 놀려봐

translation.en: [Jacob] Hey! I'm still awake over here.
I need something more powerful to get this wretched boy to sleep.
translation.ko: 저 끔찍한 녀석을 재우려면 더 강력한 게 필요해
그건 안 돼, 살려놔야지 생각 좀 해라

translation.en: Wait. Hah! That's it. Of course! What a brilliant idea.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 그렇지! 아주 좋은 수가 떠올랐어

translation.en: Little creep slobbered all over my hands.
translation.ko: 그 자식이 내 손을 침 범벅으로 만들었어

translation.en: -[Kelly] Ugh. -[Liz] Found it in his pouch.
-[Kelly] I wonder where it's from. -[fireworks exploding]
Sorry, you can't see me. I'm at-- Chh--
Then why am I looking at pictures of you
diving off a balcony on Instagram?
-She knows! -You're at that party, aren't you?
translation.ko: - 엄마가 아셔! - 너 그 파티에 갔지?
- 네가 젤먼 씨 아들을… - 그거 영상 통화야

translation.en: Please tell me that you didn't abandon Mrs. Zellman's child to go to a party!
translation.ko: 젤먼 씨 아들을 버리고 파티에 간 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: -[Kelly] Of course I didn't! -[gasps] Her voice went high.
translation.ko: 당연히 아니지! 목소리가 높아졌어 거짓말하는 거야

translation.en: She's lying! She-- Do Track My Kids.
translation.ko: 목소리가 높아졌어 거짓말하는 거야 위치 추적 앱 켜

translation.en: Berna, we're gonna need some help around here.
On it. What's her mom's e-mail?
translation.ko: 알았어, 걔 엄마 메일 주소 뭐야?

translation.en: It's the green one. In the next page.
-Peter, it's the green one. Next page. -Shh!
translation.ko: - 녹색 누르고 넘어가라고 - 쉿, 젤먼 씨 듣겠다

translation.en: -[whispers] Mrs. Zellman will hear you. -[laughs] Oh! Hi.
translation.ko: - 녹색 누르고 넘어가라고 - 쉿, 젤먼 씨 듣겠다 안녕하세요

translation.en: Well, you are at the Zellmans'.
Yeah, Mom. I-- Uh, yeah, I told you.
There has gotta be something we're not thinking of.
That means Jacob's still awake, which means…
translation.ko: 제이컵이 아직 안 자는 거고 그 말은…

translation.en: the Grand Guignol can't get him to sleep.
So how does a Boogeyman get a kid like Jacob to go to sleep?
translation.ko: 부기맨은 제이컵 같은 아이를 어떻게 재우지?

translation.en: We have the Grit of the Sandman,
Oh! Uh, uh… Cat's Eye Amulet. Cat's Eye Amulet?
translation.ko: - 고양이 눈 부적이 있어 - 고양이 눈 부적?

translation.en: Liz, you're not gonna like this.
It's at Peggy Drood's. -The Cat Lady. -[sighs]
translation.ko: 페기 드루드 집에 있어 그 고양이 여인

translation.en: -Curtis, any luck with the Angel Fire? -♪ Like a boss… ♪
-Getting the ingredients now, boss. -♪ Like a boss… ♪
[in Spanish] The petrified scales of a Kaluga Sturgeon?
Mm. That might be a little hard this time of year.
[in Hindi] I might be able to find some ground-up Mastodon tooth.
translation.ko: 마스토돈 이빨 가루는 구할 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: [in English] Possibly. But I'm not doing the grinding.
translation.ko: 가능은 한데 내가 갈진 않을 거예요

translation.en: [man on phone, in Spanish] Chupacabra venom? In October?
I was really hoping you had some Icarus Wing.
[Curtis, in English] Please tell me that you do.
[in Japanese] I'll see what I can do.
[Kelly] So, what do I need to know about this Cat Lady?
translation.ko: 이 고양이 여인에 대해 알아야 할 거 있어?

translation.en: [Liz] She's an ex silent movie star turned class five witch.
translation.ko: 무성 영화 배우에서 5급 마녀가 된 여자야

translation.en: Last year, she and the Grand Guignol teamed up
translation.ko: 작년에 이 여자랑 그랑기뇰이 손을 잡고

translation.en: and almost destroyed the whole babysitter chapter in Nepal.
translation.ko: 네팔의 베이비시터 지부를 완전히 박살 낼 뻔했어

translation.en: And she once fed an entire Girl Scout troop to her cats.
translation.ko: 걸 스카우트 전체를 자기 고양이 밥으로 준 적도 있고

translation.en: Here's the thing. I… I'm kind of allergic to cats.
translation.ko: 근데 말이지 난 고양이 알레르기가 있어

translation.en: [Liz] It's fine. It's the only way we're gonna get back Kevin.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 케빈을 찾으려면 이 방법밖에 없으니까

translation.en: The Grand Guignol took your brother?
I was six, Kevin was five.
translation.ko: 난 여섯 살이었고 케빈은 다섯 살이었어

translation.en: There was a scratch at the window.
I thought it was a tree branch or the wind.
I jumped out of bed, drew back the curtains…
and that's when I saw him.
He sang us a song, and I fell under a spell.
translation.ko: 놈은 우리한테 노래를 불렀고 난 그 주문에 걸렸지

translation.en: When I came to, Kevin was gone. I never saw my brother again.
translation.ko: 정신 차리고 보니 케빈은 사라졌고 그 후로 다신 볼 수 없었어

translation.en: I've been looking for him my whole life.
I mean, that's the reason I became a babysitter.
-It-- it wasn't your fault. -No one believes that.
translation.ko: - 네 잘못이 아니었어 - 그걸 누가 믿겠어?

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like.
To feel helpless? Out of control?
Like nobody believes you but there's nothing you can do?
translation.ko: 아무도 널 안 믿는데 넌 할 수 있는 게 없는 거?

translation.en: He came for me when I was a little kid, and no one even listened.
translation.ko: 어렸을 때 그랑기뇰이 날 찾아왔었는데 다들 내 말을 들으려고도 안 했어

translation.en: But you know what changed things?
We get in. You distract Peggy.
translation.ko: 같이 들어가서 네가 페기의 시선을 끌면

translation.en: I spray her. We grab the amulet. We split.
translation.ko: 내가 스프레이를 뿌릴게 부적 챙기고 흩어지는 거야

translation.en: -[cat yowls] -Let's just get this over with.
[Kelly] So, how many cats does she have?
-♪ You kiss too nicely… ♪ -What can I do for you ladies?
-Looking for a room? -♪ You might entice me… ♪
[Liz] How do you know who I am?
Not too great under pressure now, are you, Liz?
…you couldn't save your brother from the Boogeyman.
-[Kelly] You're gonna be okay. -[Liz] Go spray her.
translation.ko: 괜찮을 거야 가서 페기한테 뿌려 부적은 쳐다보지 말고

translation.en: Try not to look at the amulet.
translation.ko: 가서 페기한테 뿌려 부적은 쳐다보지 말고

translation.en: I'm glad you girls stopped by.
Well, well, well. What do we have here?
What brings you to my neck of the woods?
Tell me, do you have any more brilliant observations,
I bet you didn't think you'd see me again.
translation.ko: 날 또 보게 될 줄은 몰랐겠지

translation.en: ♪ Listen, you'll do as you're told ♪
translation.ko: 잘 들어 넌 내가 시키는 대로 할 거야

translation.en: [Grand Guignol] Did you really think you'd killed me?
translation.ko: 정말 날 죽인 줄 안 거냐?

translation.en: That takes Angel Fire to the heart,
translation.ko: 그러려면 천사의 불을 내 가슴에 꽂아야 해

translation.en: and I don't suppose you brought any.
-Whatever is the matter? -Cat's got her tongue.
translation.ko: - 왜 그러고 있어? - 말문이 막혀 버렸네

translation.en: -Now, Peggy, if you please-- -If I give you this…
translation.ko: - 페기, 그럼 이제… - 이걸 너한테 주면

translation.en: and the cat-astrophe I caused there?
translation.ko: 뼈아픈 실수는 없던 일이 되는 건가?

translation.en: Absolutely, yes. And, as a bonus,

translation.ko: - 하지만 얘는 내 거야 - 안 돼!

translation.en: The Grand Guignol, he… he took Liz.
-Just head back to HQ. I've got a plan. -But what if Ms. Zellman comes home early?
translation.ko: - 본부로 돌아와, 계획이 있어 - 아주머니가 일찍 오시면?

translation.en: Don't worry. I already hacked into Ms. Zellman's phone and I'm tracking her.
translation.ko: 걱정 마 벌써 휴대폰 해킹해서 추적하고 있어

translation.en: [sighs] Liz found this on the Toadie at the party.
translation.ko: 리즈가 파티장에 있던 토디 주머니에서 찾은 거야

translation.en: Well, maybe this piece of glass came from wherever he has Jacob?
translation.ko: 제이컵이 있는 곳에서 가져온 게 아닐까?

translation.en: I'll run it through the database.
I got a match on the glass. It's from the Qeeqong lighthouse.
translation.ko: 일치하는 걸 찾았어 퀴콩 등대에 있는 유리야

translation.en: Yeah, but the Qeeqong Lighthouse is condemned.
A perfect place for a Boogeyman to hide.
This is the coup de grâce, my frenemy.
Berna, do you copy? I'm here, Kelly.
I made it to the lighthouse.
In case I get lost, my sweater's tied to the fence.
translation.ko: 길을 잃을지 모르니까 철조망에 스웨터 실을 묶어놓을게

translation.en: Oh, you should see your face.
-[sings with choir] ♪ Do as you're told ♪ -No. No.
♪ Darling girl, let the monster inside ♪
-♪ Take control, it's so right ♪ -No. Stop. Stop.
translation.ko: - 네 몸을 맡겨, 옳지 - 안 돼, 그만

translation.en: ♪ Long as you do as you're ♪
I sent your brother to a dark, spidery place, far, far away.
translation.ko: 네 동생을 아주 멀고 깜깜한 거미의 집으로 보냈어

translation.en: Time for some dragon skins. Right.
And now, some kestrel eggs. Okay.
I may need some paper towel.
And now, first place for best costume goes to…
Red alert, SITs. Ms. Zellman's on the move!
[Grand Guignol] Toadies, take care of her.
We need to get to the lighthouse right now.
But we don't have Angel Fire yet.
I lost track of Ms. Zellman! [Cassie] Why'd we lose power?
translation.ko: - 젤먼 씨를 놓쳤어 - 전기는 왜 나간 거야?

translation.en: At least it's afraid of light.
But… all the doors have electronic locks.
translation.ko: 근데 모든 문에는 전자 잠금장치가 달렸어

translation.en: -No, no, no, no, wait. Wait, wait, wait. -[grumbling]
Wait, wait, wait, wait! I've got something even better.
You guys stay here and contain that monster.
-[hissing] -I'll bring the Angel Fire to Kelly.
-No one's ever contained a Shadow Monster! -If anyone can do it, it's you, Cass.
translation.ko: - 그림자 괴물을 무슨 수로 잡아? - 너라면 할 수 있어

translation.en: -That's your only way out. -[Berna] I got this.
[Cassie] The light from this glowfish will hold it back.
translation.ko: 이 빛나는 물고기가 우리를 지켜줄 거야

translation.en: -Jacob's this way. Come with me. -Wait. I thought he was in there.
translation.ko: 제이컵은 저기 있어, 날 따라와 잠깐, 저쪽에 있는 거 아니야?

translation.en: I don't wanna hurt you. But I will. [grunts]
translation.ko: 널 다치게 하긴 싫은데 어쩔 수 없네

translation.en: Remember your brother. Think about Kevin!
I know you miss him, okay? I know that.
translation.ko: 케빈이 그립잖아 보고 싶은 거 알아

translation.en: You and I, we can beat this together! Just--
translation.ko: 너와 내가 같이 무찌를 수 있어

translation.en: -How do I know it's really you? -'Cause I'm gonna kick your butt
translation.ko: 진짜 너인지 어떻게 알지? 날 안 도와주면 네 엉덩이를 걷어찰 거니까

translation.en: -if you don't help me up. -Yeah, it's you.
translation.ko: 날 안 도와주면 네 엉덩이를 걷어찰 거니까 그래, 너 맞네

translation.en: -You tried to kill me, you know. -Shhh!
translation.ko: 너 나 죽이려고 한 거 알아?

translation.en: We have to be quiet, or he'll hear us.
-[Curtis] We're gonna die. -[Cassie] Not if I hot-wire the circuit.
translation.ko: - 우린 죽을 거야 - 회로만 합선시키면 안 죽어

translation.en: -[Shadow Monster hissing] -[Cassie] How much time do I have?
[whispers] I have no idea where he went.
[Cassie] Okay. Plan B. Work with what you got.
translation.ko: 그럼 다음 계획으로 넘어가자 시간 좀 끌어봐

translation.en: I just need to hook this up to these batteries--
-And then what? How do we catch a shadow? -[hissing]
translation.ko: 그럼 뭐? 그림자를 어떻게 잡을 건데?

translation.en: -[gasps] That'll contain it. -[Cassie] But how do we get it in there?
translation.ko: - 저거면 잡을 수 있어 - 저 안에 어떻게 넣어?

translation.en: If we move together, we can rope him into it!
translation.ko: 우리가 같이 움직이면 줄로 몰고 갈 수 있어

translation.en: Please, please, please, please. Please, please, please, please. Please, please…
-[Cassie] It's coming straight for us. -I'll go get the box.
-[Curtis] Okay. You need to come with me. -Okay.
-[Cassie] Hurry up! Hurry up! -[Curtis] I-- I'm going as fast as I can!
translation.ko: 더 빨리! 이게 제일 빠른 거야

translation.en: [Curtis] Come on. We can do this.
You're gonna have to close the lid, but whatever you do,
translation.ko: 뚜껑 닫을 때 조심해 절대 놈이 손에 닿으면 안 돼

translation.en: don't let him touch your hand.
translation.ko: 절대 놈이 손에 닿으면 안 돼

translation.en: Why? What happens if he touches my hand, Cassie?
translation.ko: 왜? 닿으면 어떻게 되는데? 어떻게 되냐고!

translation.en: -What happens if he touches my hand? -Just do it!
translation.ko: 왜? 닿으면 어떻게 되는데? 어떻게 되냐고! 그냥 닫아!

translation.en: That is what happens when you break into HQ and mess with my friends.
translation.ko: 감히 본부에 침입해서 내 친구들을 괴롭혀? 꼴 좋다!

translation.en: We caught it! No one's ever caught a Shadow Monster before.
translation.ko: 아무도 못 잡은 그림자 괴물을 우리가 잡았어

translation.en: It's actually kinda cute. Can we keep him?
I don't wanna keep him. I don't wanna…
I need you to deliver a message to my sister.
translation.ko: 네가 우리 누나한테 말 좀 전해줘야겠어

translation.en: He still thinks you're under his spell.
translation.ko: 네가 주문에 걸려 있는 줄 알아

translation.en: [Grand Guignol] Have you met my sister, Serena, The Spider Queen?
translation.ko: 만나보면 알 거야 내 누나인 거미 여왕 세리나는

translation.en: She thinks she's so cool and so evil,
translation.ko: 자기가 제일 잘나고 사악한 줄 알지

translation.en: just because she's the Queen of the Boogeypeople
Just a stupid little dreamer, am I, sis?
Little brother will be in charge, with my army of nightmares
translation.ko: 이 어린 동생이 악몽 군단을 이끌고

translation.en: waiting to rip humanity to shreds!
How long have you been standing there?
Ah, whatever. Did you lock your little friend up?
We'll make a fine monster-sitter out of you yet, Liz.
After tonight, we'll be monstrously busy. Get it?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤이 지나면 무시무시하게 바빠질 거야 알겠어?

translation.en: Grand Guignol, there's a problem with the back tank.
If one of the Toadies has fallen in again, I'm leaving them there. Come!
translation.ko: 또 토디가 빠진 거면 그냥 내버려 둘 거야, 가자!

translation.en: What are you talking about? It's working perfectly.
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 아주 잘 돌아가고 있잖아

translation.en: -My mistake, Grand Guignol. -Yes, it was, you stupid child.
translation.ko: 제가 착각했습니다, 그랑기뇰 그래, 이 멍청한 것

translation.en: The stench of your fear gave you away.
Did you really think you could sneak up on me?
translation.ko: 나한테 기습 작전이 통할 줄 알았어?

translation.en: By the Order of the Babysitters, I demand you give us Jacob.
translation.ko: 베이비시터 결사단의 이름으로 제이컵을 돌려줄 것을 요구한다

translation.en: By the Order of the Boogeyman, you're a blithering idiot.
Who do you think you're dealing with?
Master of Menace, Sultan of Suffering,
And you're babysitters. I almost feel sorry for you.
Release our new friends upon the world!
We've rehearsed this for six months!
Bare your teeth, my beautiful nightmares.
[scoffs] You didn't really think you had a chance to defeat me, did you?
translation.ko: 진짜 날 이길 생각을 했던 건 아니지?

translation.en: Is that the best you've got? [laughs]
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
It's okay, Jacob. He's gone. You're safe! Okay?
Wait. Why are the nightmares still here?
You don't need to be afraid anymore.
Tell 'em to take a hike, kid.
I'm not scared of you anymore.
[Ms. Zellman] Kelly, this is the sixth message I've left you.
It's okay, Kelly. You don't have to check under the bed.
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 침대 밑 안 봐도 돼요

translation.en: I think I'll have good dreams from now on.
translation.ko: 앞으로는 좋은 꿈을 꿀 것 같아요

translation.en: I think you will too, bud.
-[car door opens and closes] -Look… you're not gonna tell your mom what happened tonight, right?
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 일은 엄마한테 말 안 할 거지?

translation.en: -[front door opens] -Will you babysit me again?
[Ms. Zellman] Jacob! Jacob! Are you okay? Where are you?
I can't believe you got him to fall asleep. You're a lifesaver.
translation.ko: 제이컵을 재웠다니 믿기지 않네 넌 내 은인이야

translation.en: Listen, if you're not busy tomorrow night…
translation.ko: 있잖아 - 혹시 내일 밤에 시간 되면… - 올게요
- 혹시 내일 밤에 시간 되면… - 올게요

translation.en: I wasn't gonna say that, but…
Seeing as you displayed courage and brains in the face of danger, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah…
translation.ko: 네가 위험을 무릅쓰고 보여준 용기와 지혜 어쩌고저쩌고…

translation.en: I'm gonna talk to Mama Vee, and I'm gonna tell her
you should at least be allowed to apply to the Order.
translation.ko: 네가 결사단에 지원할 수 있게 해달라고 할게

translation.en: You still have to pass Heck Week.
And you may have upset the monster underworld tonight.
translation.ko: 네가 오늘 몬스터 지하 세계의 심기를 건드렸을지도 몰라

translation.en: Serena the Spider Queen is one of the Grand Guignol's sisters.
And, Liz? We're gonna get Kevin back, too.
translation.ko: 그리고, 리즈 우린 케빈도 다시 데려올 거야

translation.en: AKA Serena Salazar, AKA the Spider Queen.
-♪ You can tell my face, face… ♪ -Oh, no.
Uh, sorry I'm calling so late.
I was wondering if you wanted to maybe go to the movies tomorrow night?
translation.ko: 혹시 내일 밤에 나랑 영화 보러 갈래?

translation.en: I'd like to, but… I'm babysitting tomorrow night.
translation.ko: 너무 가고 싶은데 내일 밤에 아이 봐주기로 했어

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. Let's, uh… Let's talk at school on Monday.
"The most beautiful and charming of all seven Boogies.
Her fangs eject a deadly venom that can bewitch,
translation.ko: "거미 여왕" '송곳니에서 내뿜는 치명적인 독은 그녀의 기분에 따라'

translation.en: paralyze, or kill her prey, depending on her mood.
-She's as fast as she is lethal." -♪ I'm not the girl who cried wolf ♪
